title: FPS :/
body: Before a while i was playing with 140 fps but now i get 30 fps what should i do i just updated windows upgrade

replies.body: With your recent Windows update, you might have outdated settings or drivers.  I suggest going over our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) issues to tune up your PC and get this fixed up.  Let me know if you run into any issues afterwards!
